eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: New Hampshire; at 12:15 PM ON JAN 13, 2026 Effective until 01:15 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The New Hampshire State Police has activated the New Hampshire Emergency Alert System in order to conduct a required monthly test. This concludes this test of the New Hampshire Emergency Alert System. No action required.
